Director: Fatih Akin, Yvan Attal, Allen Hughes, Shunji Iwai
Screenwriter: Hall Powell, Israel Horovitz, James C. Strouse, Shunji Iwai
Production Co: Rose Pictures, Sherazade Film Development, Plum Pictures, 2008NY5, Ever So Close, Benaroya Pictures, Vivendi Entertainment, Also Known As Pictures, Grand Army Entertainment, Visitor Pictures, Grosvenor Park Productions
Synopsis: On the eve of her wedding, a Hasidic woman (Natalie Portman) considers a romance with another man, in one of several love stories set in New York.
Title: New York, I Love You
